019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.base;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.lang.management.ManagementFactory;
023import java.lang.ref.WeakReference;
024import java.time.ZoneId;
025import java.util.Collections;
026import java.util.HashSet;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Locale;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.Set;
031import java.util.SortedMap;
032import java.util.TreeMap;
033import java.util.logging.Level;
034import java.util.logging.Logger;
035import java.util.stream.Collectors;
036import javax.management.InstanceAlreadyExistsException;
037import javax.management.MBeanRegistrationException;
038import javax.management.MBeanServer;
039import javax.management.MalformedObjectNameException;
040import javax.management.NotCompliantMBeanException;
041import javax.management.ObjectName;
042import org.jdrupes.json.JsonArray;
043import org.jdrupes.json.JsonObject;
044import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
045import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
046import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
047import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
048import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletDeleted;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleConfigured;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleLayoutChanged;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.DeleteConlet;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.JsonInput;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequest;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SimpleConsoleCommand;
061
062/**
063 * Provides the web console component related part of the console.
064 */
065@SuppressWarnings("PMD.GuardLogStatement")
066public class WebConsole extends Component {
067
068    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
069    private static final Logger logger
070        = Logger.getLogger(WebConsole.class.getName());
071
072    private ConsoleWeblet view;
073
074    /**
075     * @param componentChannel
076     */
077    /* default */ WebConsole(Channel componentChannel) {
078        super(componentChannel);
079    }
080
081    /* default */ void setView(ConsoleWeblet view) {
082        this.view = view;
083        MBeanView.addConsole(this);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Handle JSON input.
088     *
089     * @param event the event
090     * @param channel the channel
091     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
092     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
093     */
094    @Handler
095    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
096        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.NcssCount" })
097    public void onJsonInput(JsonInput event, ConsoleSession channel)
098            throws InterruptedException, IOException {
099        // Send events to web console components on console's channel
100        JsonArray params = event.request().params();
101        switch (event.request().method()) {
102        case "consoleReady": {
103            fire(new ConsoleReady(view.renderSupport()), channel);
104            break;
105        }
106        case "addConlet": {
107            fire(new AddConletRequest(view.renderSupport(),
108                params.asString(0), params.asArray(1).stream().map(
109                    value -> RenderMode.valueOf((String) value))
110                    .collect(Collectors.toSet()),
111                params.size() < 3 ? Collections.emptyMap()
112                    : ((JsonObject) params.get(2)).backing()),
113                channel);
114            break;
115        }
116        case "conletsDeleted": {
117            for (var item : params.asArray(0).backing()) {
118                var conletInfo = (JsonArray) item;
119                fire(
120                    new ConletDeleted(view.renderSupport(),
121                        conletInfo.asString(0),
122                        conletInfo.asArray(1).stream().map(
123                            value -> RenderMode.valueOf((String) value))
124                            .collect(Collectors.toSet()),
125                        conletInfo.size() < 3 ? Collections.emptyMap()
126                            : ((JsonObject) conletInfo.get(2)).backing()),
127                    channel);
128            }
129            break;
130        }
131        case "consoleLayout": {
132            List<String> previewLayout = params.asArray(0).stream().map(
133                value -> (String) value).collect(Collectors.toList());
134            List<String> tabsLayout = params.asArray(1).stream().map(
135                value -> (String) value).collect(Collectors.toList());
136            JsonObject xtraInfo = (JsonObject) params.get(2);
137            fire(new ConsoleLayoutChanged(
138                previewLayout, tabsLayout, xtraInfo), channel);
139            break;
140        }
141        case "renderConlet": {
142            fire(new RenderConletRequest(view.renderSupport(),
143                params.asString(0),
144                params.asArray(1).stream().map(
145                    value -> RenderMode.valueOf((String) value))
146                    .collect(Collectors.toSet())),
147                channel);
148            break;
149        }
150        case "setLocale": {
151            fire(new SetLocale(view.renderSupport(),
152                Locale.forLanguageTag(params.asString(0)),
153                params.asBoolean(1)), channel);
154            break;
155        }
156        case "notifyConletModel": {
157            fire(new NotifyConletModel(view.renderSupport(),
158                params.asString(0), params.asString(1),
159                params.size() <= 2
160                    ? JsonArray.EMPTY_ARRAY
161                    : params.asArray(2)),
162                channel);
163            break;
164        }
165        default:
166            // Ignore unknown
167            break;
168        }
169    }
170
171    /**
172     * Handle network configured condition.
173     *
174     * @param event the event
175     * @param channel the channel
176     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
177     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
178     */
179    @Handler
180    public void onConsoleConfigured(
181            ConsoleConfigured event, ConsoleSession channel)
182            throws InterruptedException, IOException {
183        channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("consoleConfigured"));
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Fallback handler that sends a {@link DeleteConlet} event 
188     * if the {@link RenderConletRequest} event has not been handled
189     * successfully.
190     *
191     * @param event the event
192     * @param channel the channel
193     */
194    @Handler(priority = -1_000_000)
195    public void onRenderConlet(
196            RenderConletRequest event, ConsoleSession channel) {
197        if (!event.hasBeenRendered()) {
198            channel.respond(
199                new DeleteConlet(event.conletId(), Collections.emptySet()));
200        }
201    }
202
203    /**
204     * Discard all console sessions on stop.
205     *
206     * @param event the event
207     */
208    @Handler
209    public void onStop(Stop event) {
210        for (ConsoleSession ps : ConsoleSession.byConsole(this)) {
211            ps.discard();
212        }
213    }
214
215    /**
216     * The MBeans view of a console.
217     */
218    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CommentRequired", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
219    public interface ConsoleMXBean {
220
221        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CommentRequired")
222        class ConsoleSessionInfo {
223
224            private final ConsoleSession session;
225
226            public ConsoleSessionInfo(ConsoleSession session) {
227                super();
228                this.session = session;
229            }
230
231            public String getChannel() {
232                return session.upstreamChannel().toString();
233            }
234
235            public String getExpiresAt() {
236                return session.expiresAt().atZone(ZoneId.systemDefault())
237                    .toString();
238            }
239        }
240
241        String getComponentPath();
242
243        String getPrefix();
244
245        boolean isUseMinifiedResources();
246
247        void setUseMinifiedResources(boolean useMinifiedResources);
248
249        SortedMap<String, ConsoleSessionInfo> getConsoleSessions();
250    }
251
252    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CommentRequired")
253    public static class WebConsoleInfo implements ConsoleMXBean {
254
255        private static MBeanServer mbs
256            = ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer();
257
258        private ObjectName mbeanName;
259        private final WeakReference<WebConsole> consoleRef;
260
261        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.GuardLogStatement")
262        public WebConsoleInfo(WebConsole console) {
263            try {
264                mbeanName = new ObjectName("org.jgrapes.webconsole:type="
265                    + WebConsole.class.getSimpleName() + ",name="
266                    + ObjectName.quote(Components.simpleObjectName(console)
267                        + " (" + console.view.prefix().toString() + ")"));
268            } catch (MalformedObjectNameException e) {
269                // Should not happen
270                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e.getMessage(), e);
271            }
272            consoleRef = new WeakReference<>(console);
273            try {
274                mbs.unregisterMBean(mbeanName);
275            } catch (Exception e) { // NOPMD
276                // Just in case, should not work
277            }
278            try {
279                mbs.registerMBean(this, mbeanName);
280            } catch (InstanceAlreadyExistsException | MBeanRegistrationException
281                    | NotCompliantMBeanException e) {
282                // Should not happen
283                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e.getMessage(), e);
284            }
285        }
286
287        public Optional<WebConsole> console() {
288            WebConsole console = consoleRef.get();
289            if (console == null) {
290                try {
291                    mbs.unregisterMBean(mbeanName);
292                } catch (Exception e) { // NOPMD
293                    // Should work.
294                }
295            }
296            return Optional.ofNullable(console);
297        }
298
299        @Override
300        public String getComponentPath() {
301            return console().map(mgr -> mgr.componentPath())
302                .orElse("<removed>");
303        }
304
305        @Override
306        public String getPrefix() {
307            return console().map(
308                console -> console.view.prefix().toString())
309                .orElse("<unknown>");
310        }
311
312        @Override
313        public boolean isUseMinifiedResources() {
314            return console().map(
315                console -> console.view.useMinifiedResources())
316                .orElse(false);
317        }
318
319        @Override
320        public void setUseMinifiedResources(boolean useMinifiedResources) {
321            console().ifPresent(console -> console.view.setUseMinifiedResources(
322                useMinifiedResources));
323        }
324
325        @Override
326        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
327        public SortedMap<String, ConsoleSessionInfo> getConsoleSessions() {
328            SortedMap<String, ConsoleSessionInfo> result = new TreeMap<>();
329            console().ifPresent(console -> {
330                for (ConsoleSession ps : ConsoleSession.byConsole(console)) {
331                    result.put(Components.simpleObjectName(ps),
332                        new ConsoleSessionInfo(ps));
333                }
334            });
335            return result;
336        }
337    }
338
339    /**
340     * An MBean interface for getting information about all consoles.
341     * 
342     * There is currently no summary information. However, the (periodic)
343     * invocation of {@link WebConsoleSummaryMXBean#getConsoles()} ensures
344     * that entries for removed {@link WebConsole}s are unregistered.
345     */
346    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CommentRequired")
347    public interface WebConsoleSummaryMXBean {
348
349        Set<ConsoleMXBean> getConsoles();
350
351    }
352
353    /**
354     * Provides an MBean view of the console.
355     */
356    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CommentRequired")
357    private static class MBeanView implements WebConsoleSummaryMXBean {
358
359        private static Set<WebConsoleInfo> consoleInfos = new HashSet<>();
360
361        public static void addConsole(WebConsole console) {
362            synchronized (consoleInfos) {
363                consoleInfos.add(new WebConsoleInfo(console));
364            }
365        }
366
367        @Override
368        public Set<ConsoleMXBean> getConsoles() {
369            Set<WebConsoleInfo> expired = new HashSet<>();
370            synchronized (consoleInfos) {
371                for (WebConsoleInfo consoleInfo : consoleInfos) {
372                    if (!consoleInfo.console().isPresent()) {
373                        expired.add(consoleInfo);
374                    }
375                }
376                consoleInfos.removeAll(expired);
377            }
378            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
379            Set<ConsoleMXBean> result
380                = (Set<ConsoleMXBean>) (Object) consoleInfos;
381            return result;
382        }
383    }
384
385    static {
386        try {
387            MBeanServer mbs = ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer();
388            ObjectName mxbeanName
389                = new ObjectName("org.jgrapes.webconsole:type="
390                    + WebConsole.class.getSimpleName() + "s");
391            mbs.registerMBean(new MBeanView(), mxbeanName);
392        } catch (MalformedObjectNameException | InstanceAlreadyExistsException
393                | MBeanRegistrationException | NotCompliantMBeanException e) {
394            // Should not happen
395            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e.getMessage(), e);
396        }
397    }
398}
